name: voidmarket-circuits
description: ZK circuits for VoidMarket hidden bet directions

scripts.compile: npm run compile:commitment && npm run compile:nullifier && npm run compile:reveal
scripts.setup:commitment: snarkjs groth16 setup build/bet_commitment.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau build/bet_commitment.zkey
scripts.setup:nullifier: snarkjs groth16 setup build/bet_nullifier.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau build/bet_nullifier.zkey
scripts.setup:reveal: snarkjs groth16 setup build/bet_reveal.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_12.ptau build/bet_reveal.zkey
scripts.setup: npm run setup:commitment && npm run setup:nullifier && npm run setup:reveal
scripts.export: npm run export:commitment && npm run export:nullifier && npm run export:reveal
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run export
scripts.download-ptau: mkdir -p ptau && curl -L https://hermez.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau -o ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau && curl -L https://hermez.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/powersOfTau28_hez_final_12.ptau -o ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_12.ptau
